subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Ashton Gibbs had 18 points and No. 4 Pittsburgh clinched the outright Big East title, using a big second half to beat No. 19 Villanova, 60-50.
snippet: Ashton Gibbs had 18 points and No. 4 Pittsburgh clinched the outright Big East title, using a big second half to beat No. 19 Villanova, 60-50.
